citeinfo.title: Index of Historic Airphotos Avaliable via MNDNR's Webserver

descript.abstract:
The points in this dataset represent the approximate geographic location of the centroids for scanned, non-georeferenced air photos that were captured between 1930 and 2000 and are freely available via the MNDNR's webserver.
The images were captured by a variety of government entities to address a wide range of applications. Images were scanned at resolutions ranging from 150 to 1200DPI. The collection includea a mixture of black & white, true color and infrared photographs. Various image collects were taken at a range of flight heights depending on the year and purpose of the collect.
descript.purpose: This point index can be used for spatial and temporal queries and subsequent retrieval of the scanned airphotos that are available on-line from MNDNR. The atribute table includes a web link for each image centroid to corresponding online airphoto download page.

timeperd.current: Time Period of Content date indicates the date which the user can be confident of accuracy and completeness of the dataset.

theme.themekey: imageryBaseMapsEarthCover, Historic Air Photos, Imagery, Index,

idinfo.useconst: Use of the data are constrained only by the MNDNR GIS Data License Agreement. See the Distribution Liability section below for a link.

citeinfo.title: MNDNR has an online web-app that allows you to interactively click on these centroids and download the photographs. The URL for that web page is: http://www.dnr.state.mn.us/maps/landview/index.html

distinfo.distliab: The Minnesota Department of Natural Resources General Geographic Data License Agreement is online: http://www.dnr.state.mn.us/sitetools/data_software_license.html

stdorder.ordering: Please visit the download page for this dataset on the Minnesota Geospatial Commons website using the web link below (Online Linkage).

dataqual.complete: Complete over the area of the State of Minnesota

horizpa.horizpar: Points represent the approximate centroid of the scanned air photo as interpreted from index maps, U.S. Geological Survey (USGS) and Farm Service Agncy (FSA) Digital orthophoto quadrangles (DOQs) as well as other referenced products.

attracc.attraccr: The attributes have been checked for accuracy vial manual and automated methods. Corrections are made as we become aware of them. Feel free to contact us if you find an error in the data.

procstep.procdesc: This data is not derived from other sources.

attr.attrdef: The organization which provides or purchases the imagery
Project code assigned by the organization conducting the mission
Contains the four-digit year that the photo was taken
Photo ID as burned into the original photograph
Filename extension of the image file on disk. (eg, "tif" or "jpg")
UTM X coordinate in extended zone 15 meters, NAD83. The same value as is the GIS featureclass
UTM Y coordinate in extended zone 15 meters, NAD83. The same value as is the GIS featureclass
Indicates if the image has been scanned, rectified, orthorectified
Direct web link to the full resolution image on the MNDNR webserver.
